long_description:
running a business is tough
relative offer a creative approach to accountancy for creative business people. we recognise that running a business often means wearing different hats and experience tells us that most of the time the financial advice you receive isn't born from the same viewpoint. whatever your outlook on business, it's likely to correspond with how you control your finances. life never stops changing and neither should your business, which is why we choose to work differently. some accountancy firms seem to have forgotten that business, people, money and growth are all relative to you and your individual aspirations and needs. we like to think that we see our clients' businesses from lots of different angles, sharing your view, listening, challenging, educating and advising but never losing sight that it's always relative to what you want to achieve. to put it simply, we stand for bean counting and creative thinking. we might speak very different languages, but in short, we are communicators â€“ it's just that our language is numbers. it makes sense if we do the maths
generated_description: the company is an accountancy firm that offers a creative approach to accountancy for creative business people. they understand the challenges of running a business and aim to provide financial advice that is tailored to the individual aspirations and needs of their clients. they believe that business, people, money, and growth are all interconnected and work to share their clients' views, listen, challenge, educate, and advise while never losing sight that it is always relative to what the client wants to achieve. the company is known for their bean counting and creative thinking, and they are communicators who speak multiple languages.
